anchors.yaml:
---
hr:
  - Mark McGwire
  # Following node labeled SS
  - &SS Sammy Sosa
rbi:
  - *SS # Subsequent occurrence
  - Ken Griffey

large documents.yaml:
# grammar.preg-coffee
---
# Matches a character class
- Class: [ all, [
  [ literal, '[' ],
  [ label, content, maybe_some, all, [
    [ any, [
      [ literal, \ ],
      [ reject, literal, ']' ]
    ] ],
    advance
  ] ],
  [ literal, ']' ]
] ]

# Matches a double indent (an indent followed by two space)
- DOUBLE_INDENT: [ all, [
  INDENT,
  SPACE,
  SPACE
] ]

# Matches a single indent (a newline followed by two space)
- INDENT: [ all, [
  NEWLINE,
  SPACE,
  SPACE
] ]

# Matches a single whitespace character (newline or space)
- WHITESPACE: [ any, [
  NEWLINE,
  SPACE
] ]

# Matches a single CR/FL newline
- NEWLINE: [ any,
  [ all, [
    [ literal, "\r" ],
    [ maybe, literal, "\n" ]
  ] ],
  [ literal, "\n" ]
]

# Matches a single space
- SPACE: [ literal, ' ' ]
...
